creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, full bleed, photomechanical illustration of two figures with text and designs printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 12 pp.
inscription: pp. 1, black ink pen: To Fly with love! (heart) (illeg. signiture)
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Passing Notes
